title: Delhi air stays 'Very Poor'; IMD issues yellow alert for thunderstorms

title: La Niña weakens as some models hint at El Niño from June
description: La Niña weakens in early 2026; some models suggest El Niño may develop from June, potentially impacting rainfall in India, Asia, and the Americas.
content:
Rain-bearing La Nina continues to weaken even as some weather models point to the emergence of drought-bearing El Nino from June onwards, according to Australias Bureau of Meteorology (BoM).

title: 'Historic', 'very positive', 'quiet diplomacy': Ex-Indian envoys hail India-US trade deal
